markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Nightmare](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=76)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 244</row>

_This entry did not have a separate description for the family._

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Greater Nightmare](/Monsters.aspx?ID=309) (Creature 11), [Nightmare](/Monsters.aspx?ID=308) (Creature 6)

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_4_RelatedCreatures.png">Nightmare Steeds</title>

Nightmares allow only the evilest of creatures to ride them and are willing partners in destruction those creatures inflict. Night hags are particularly well known to associate with nightmares.
</aside>
name: Nightmare
